review.author: DevOps + Analyst
review.findings: 4-fix layered defense: (1) shouldIgnoreExit guard persists for both onExit handlers, (2) Gemini bypasses isPromptReady to avoid stale false positives, (3) spawnAgent prefers explicit model param for Gemini detection, (4) terminal.clear() on restart removes stale buffer. All complementary, no conflicts. Memory safe (max 3 entries). Indentation fix applied to recovery.js SDK branch. 90 suites / 2807 tests passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
